festival.introText:
Cultivate is the North East’s biggest electronic music festival set across two days against the backdrop of the beautiful Aberdeen beach.

The festival has become a regular fixture in Scotlands event calendar since 2018 and is renowned for bringing the biggest international artists in the world to Aberdeen across multiple indoor and outdoor stages.

The unique venue is custom built for each event in an old arcade building and features an array of interesting spaces across multiple floors designed to easily accommodate 2500+ ravers per day.
festival.descriptionText: Skiddle is an official ticket outlet of Cultivate Rave Revival 2023. Get Cultivate Rave Revival Festival tickets, news and information with Skiddle.com

reviews.title: Review of Cultivate 2022
reviews.body: The music and atmosphere was great but on the Saturday it was uncomfortably crowded and the venue was badly ventilated which made it difficult to breathe inside. I left hours early because it was so stuffy. Itâ??s a great event but would benefit from a better ventilated or outdoor venue.

faqs.question: When is Cultivate Festival 2023: Summer Edition?
faqs.answer: Cultivate Festival 2023: Summer Edition takes place Friday 12th May - Saturday 13th May 2023.

faqs.question: What happens if I bought a ticket and cannot attend?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately we can’t issue you with a refund if you can’t make the event due to work commitments or your mates have dropped out. In these circumstances, we advise passing on your tickets privately to avoid losing out on the money spent. Refunds can only be offered if the event is cancelled or postponed, as agreed upon purchase.

faqs.question: Accessibility information
faqs.answer: Cultivate try their best to be accessible to anyone with a disability. Please contact Cultivate directly via e-mail or social media and they will try as best as is reasonably possible to accommodate you.

faqs.question: Parking
faqs.answer: There is limited parking available near the site along the beach esplanade, however we recommend getting a lift, taxi or bus there. Do not drink and drive.

faqs.question: Where is Cultivate Festival 2023: Summer Edition?
faqs.answer: Cultivate Festival 2023: Summer Edition is located at 24 Esplanade, Aberdeen AB24 5NS.

faqs.question: Are there any age restrictions at Cultivate Festival?
faqs.answer:
Yes you must be 18 or over to attend Cultivate Festival. You may be asked to show photo ID. The only forms of ID that are accepted to ensure festival entry are the following:

Valid Provisional Driving Licence

Valid Full Driving Licence

Valid Passport

Young Scot Card

faqs.question: What is the re-entry policy?
faqs.answer: Once you’ve entered the festival you will receive a wrist band, please do not take this off as it will allow you to re-enter the arena. The same search and ID check policy will be in force upon re-entry.

faqs.question: When is final entry?
faqs.answer: Final entry is 6PM, we recommend arriving well before this or expect to queue. The festival opens at 2PM.

faqs.question: Afterparty information
faqs.answer: Afterparties are held at Unit 51. Keep an eye on Cultivate's socials for the headliner announcements. Tickets are sold separately for the afterparties and are not included in your festival ticket.

faqs.question: Prohibited items
faqs.answer:
Prohibited items include:

  • Drugs 
  • Your own food & drink
  • Knives & Weapons
  • Any bags larger than A4 Size
  • Football Tops

 

Use Your Common Sense

faqs.question: Bar payment
faqs.answer: This is a cashless festival so please bring your cards. Mastercard & Visa accepted. Apple and Google pay accepted.

faqs.question: Lost & Found
faqs.answer: All lost and found will be available to pick up at the Beach bar/ Innoflate from the Monday after the event. Cultivate & Innoflate do not take any responsibility for items that have been lost.

faqs.question: Cloakroom
faqs.answer: There will be a cloakroom at the venue for a fee of £3. Do not lose your ticket.
